greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct values obtained when arithmetic derivative (A003415) is applied to the divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
(PARI) a(n) = my(d = divisors(n)); for(i = 1, #d, d[i] = A003415(d[i])); #Set(d) \\ uses A003415 listed at Antti's programs. _David A. Corneth_, Oct 02 2018
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2018
